title: Side Effects of Intersectionality (with Chris Emdin)
description:
This week we vibe with professor and author Chris Emdin (Ratchetdemic: Reimagining Academic Success) about the myriad of ways intersectionality shows up and is left out of conversations on race, identity, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
